    net.antidot.api.search  

    • Uses of Query in net.antidot.api.search

      Methods in net.antidot.api.search that return Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Query Query.addFeed(java.lang.String feed)
      Adds new feed value to existing ones.
      Query Query.addFilter(java.lang.String facetId, java.lang.String valueKey)
      Adds new filter value.
      static Query Query.create()
      Creates new query with default parameter values.
      Query QueryCoder.decode(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> parameters)
      Creates new query from parameters.
      Query Query.removeFilter(java.lang.String facetId, java.lang.String valueKey)
      Removes a filter values from the list of values associated to the specified facet identifier.
      Query Query.resetSort()
      Reset sort parameter.
      Query Query.setFeed(java.lang.String feed)
      Sets new feed value overwriting any existing one.
      Query Query.setFilter(java.lang.String facetId, java.lang.String valueKey)
      Sets new filter value.
      Query Query.setLanguage(Lang langCode)
      Defines new language value with language code only.
      Query Query.setLanguage(Lang langCode, Region regionCode)
      Defines new language value with language and country code.
      Query Query.setLanguage(Language lang)
      Defines new language value.
      Query Query.setPage(long pageNo)
      Defines new page number.
      Query Query.setPage(java.lang.String pageNo)
      Defines new page number.
      Query Query.setReplies(int repliesNb)
      Sets new number of replies per page.
      Query Query.setReplies(java.lang.String repliesNb)
      Sets new number of replies per page.
      Query Query.setSearchString(java.lang.String searchString)
      Defines new search string.
      Query Query.setSort(java.lang.String sortOrder)
      Defines new sort order replacing existing one.
